level.heading: Hearing examiner; appointment, powers and duties; appeals.
Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 501(e) of Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Temporary Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Law 11-226, April 9, 1997, law notification 44 DCR 2584).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 501(e) of the Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-302, July 25, 1996, 43 DCR 4181), § 501(e) of the Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-429, October 29, 1996, 43 DCR 6151), and § 501(e) of the Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Congressional Adjournment Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-2, February 19, 1997, 44 DCR 1590).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-198
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-198, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-305.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: D.C. Law 11-226, title V, § 501(e) (44 DCR 124), eff. April 9, 1997, provided for the temporary repeal of this section.

Title XII, § 1201(b) of D.C. Law 11-226 provided for expiration "after 225 days of its having taken effect, or upon the effective date of the Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Amendment Act of 1996, whichever occurs first."
